query.name: collectLeaveNumber
query.sqlXml:
<Query> <Sql> <SqlStr><![CDATA[select classId, (count(classId)) ccc from t_leaves group by classId having classId = '041709'
--select classId, count(classId) from t_leaves group_exp ::= classId]]></SqlStr> </Sql> </Query>

query.name: selectCollege
query.sqlXml:
<Query> <Sql> <SqlStr><![CDATA[--select * from t_classes a where a.classId = :scid --select classId from t_classes WHERE majorId = 'm0401' --SELECT classId --FROM t_classes --WHERE majorId = :mid --select distinct c.classId from t_classes c, t_majors m, t_teachers t --where t.tcollegeId='c04' and m.collegeId=t.tcollegeId and c.majorId=m.majorId;
--SELECT DISTINCT c.classId --FROM t_classes c --INNER JOIN t_majors m ON c.majorId = m.majorId --INNER JOIN t_teachers t ON t.tcollegeId = 'c04' -- AND m.collegeId = t.tcollegeId;
select sname from t_students s where s.majorId in ((select m.majorId from t_majors m where m.collegeId = :cid)) --select majorId from t_majors where collegeId = 'c04'
]]></SqlStr> </Sql> </Query>

query.name: s_findStuByDiffCollege
query.chineseName: 查询某个教师管理下的学生
query.sqlXml:
<Query> <Sql> <SqlStr><![CDATA[--select sno from t_students s where s.majorId in ((select m.majorId from t_majors m where m.collegeId = :cid))
select * from t_leaves where applicantId in ((select sno from t_students s where s.majorId in ((select m.majorId from t_majors m where m.collegeId = :cid))))]]></SqlStr> </Sql> </Query>

query.name: s_getCollegeByMajor
query.sqlXml: <Query> <Sql> <SqlStr><![CDATA[select collegeId from t_majors where majorId =: mid ]]></SqlStr> </Sql> </Query>
